attributes.action: allow the computer game Manhunt 2 to be sold in the United Kingdom, as banning it is censorship, and one step closer to a fascist government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBFC has denied classification for Manhunt 2, a video game for the Nintendo Wii, because it is violent. The BBFC is meant to rate video games, and give guidance as to the contents of it. It is not meant to censor games, and we believe the the refusal to classify it is one step closer to a fascist state.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
